ai_description: A roll of pink and white patterned cleaning cloths featuring a distinctive wavy texture. The product is packaged in a cardboard roll with colorful branding in white, purple, blue, green, and orange. Each cloth measures 35cm x 25cm and is made of 100% viscose rayon non-woven fabric. The packaging clearly displays the OKS brand, quantity (30 pieces), and highlights the easy-to-use roll format. The cloths have a soft, textured appearance suitable for various cleaning tasks.
